title: Beautiful Beach Front Land Uswetakeiyawa
details: An amazing view of the indian ocean with easy access to the beach. The land is approximately 40 perches and is adjacent to the sea shine beach hotel which consists of a pool, restaurant and bar. The land also comes with all the required documents. Its also 30 minutes from Colombo and 10 minutes from the Ja Ela highway entrance. The area is undergoing rapid development with new apartments such as the beach front by prime land and many more hotels being built within 1km from the land. If you have any enquires please contact me at amalla70@yahoo.com.
